description: This dataset shows payments made by state agencies in FY2014 which were $25,000 or more. All parties receiving funds are shown: private businesses, local governments, non-profit organizations, and individuals.

metadata.attribution: Maryland Department of Budget and Management

name: FY14 Payments Data
